priority_areas: lib/auth/ - All authentication screens have numerous hardcoded texts
lib/user/ - User-facing screens with form labels, button texts, messages
lib/admin/ - Admin panel with section titles, action labels, confirmations
lib/mediator/ - Mediator portal with dashboard labels and form texts
lib/widgets/ - Reusable components with hardcoded labels
lib/core/constants.dart - App-wide constants that should be localized
notes: All Text widgets displaying user-visible content need localization
Button labels, navigation texts, and action labels are critical for UX
Validation messages, error messages, and success confirmations need translation
Empty state messages and placeholder texts should be localized
Section titles, screen headers, and dialog titles are user-facing
Badge labels and status indicators need translation support
Demo credentials and mock data strings can remain hardcoded or be made configurable
Asset paths and technical keys should NOT be localized
